title: Pandangan generasi muda Hakka terhadap keberlangsungan perkumpulan Hwie Tiauw Ka Surabaya
abstract: In Surabaya city of East Java province of Indonesia there is a long-established Hakka social organization called “Hwie Tiauw Ka”, it was established in 1820. This association has been through many difficulties. One of the difficulties is the majority members of Hwie Tiauw Ka association are the elderly. So they really need to prepare the youngsters to preserve this association. In order to do this, they open a Hakka dialect course, hold many activities, and establish a Hakka Youth Division. Hope that these activities can attract the youngsters to flourish and preserve this Hwie Tiauw Ka social organization. This thesis used qualitative research methods, interviewed youngsters who had participated in the activities held by this social organization. The result is the informants thought that preserving this social organization is a must, because this social organization can inherit Hakka culture to the next generation and they pointed out their viewpoints, expressions, and suggestions towards Hwie Tiauw Ka.
subjects: HAKKA (CHINESE PEOPLE); CHINESE-INDONESIA-SOCIETIES, ETC.; CHINESE-INDONESIA-ETHNIC IDENTITY
